description:
Rickert lands in the dukedom of Eylstad on a secret mission: to uncover the secrets of the witch. He`s sent to infiltrate the old castle of Eylstad, which is being heavily guarded by the Royal Guard.  But his mission takes an unexpected turn when he runs into Bianca, the head of the Royal Guard...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 残酷なおとぎばなし Das grausame Märchen
